Make XICOR Test Examples
================

``` r
library(XICOR)
library(yaml)

mk_vec <- function() {
  # sample.int(n=10, size = 20, replace = TRUE)  # calculation seems unstable in tie breaking
  runif(n = 20)
}

mk_example <- function(...) {
  a <- mk_vec()
  b <- mk_vec()
  xicor <- calculateXI(a, b, seed=NULL)
  list(a = a, b = b, xicor = xicor)
}

examples <- lapply(1:20, mk_example)

examples
```

``` r
f <- file("examples.yaml")
writeLines(as.yaml(examples), f)
close(f)
```
